line.comment: * Task 2044.
* This task runs on any Abandoned ship. It periodically senses if it's been claimed in a polling loop.
* If it is claimed, it takes some actions.
* Mordan2
* Mordan9 - Claiming M7 or larger incurs a loss of notoriety with the race whose space you are in.
* Note, at -1000, you will turn Red and be attacked.
* MordanA - no hit for black market mission ship.
* Add-Ons 1.4.18: Xenon and Phanon are always permanently enemy or friendly, depending on playthrough. No need to tax them here or in Phanon.
* MordanB
* Add-Ons 1.4.18: Call Joubarbe.Lib.AddReputation instead, as it handles favor and loyalty point loss should player's rep fall below 0.
* Fix displaying -rep loss. Should display rep loss (no double negatives).

line.text: 'Ваша репутация с %s упала на %s и теперь составляет: %s'

line.comment: * Removes from internal list (get ship array of [Neutral Race] doesn't work).
* Herobetty 5.4: Removed redundant black market mission variable getter, as it's already done earlier in this script.
* Also checks if the new owner is not the player. If so, and the ship is a black market ship, mission fails.
* The player has 4/3/2 +/- 0.5 hours on easy/normal/hard to claim the ship for their own. After that, the ship becomes open for anyone to grab.
* Remnant and black market "missions".
* Herobetty 5.4: an NPC faction claimed this ship, and it is a black market ship!
* Herobetty 5.4: remove the ship from the black market ship array, if it's present.
* This array is used in the monitor script to determine when to allow the ship to be capturable by tugs.
* Mordan2 - we name our own captured ships elsewhere.

sval.val: Ваша репутация с %s упала на %s и теперь составляет: %s
Task 2044.
This task runs on any Abandoned ship. It periodically senses if it's been claimed in a polling loop.
If it is claimed, it takes some actions.
Mordan9 - Claiming M7 or larger incurs a loss of notoriety with the race whose space you are in.
Note, at -1000, you will turn Red and be attacked.
MordanA - no hit for black market mission ship.
Add-Ons 1.4.18: Xenon and Phanon are always permanently enemy or friendly, depending on playthrough. No need to tax them here or in Phanon.
Add-Ons 1.4.18: Call Joubarbe.Lib.AddReputation instead, as it handles favor and loyalty point loss should player's rep fall below 0.
Fix displaying -rep loss. Should display rep loss (no double negatives).
Removes from internal list (get ship array of [Neutral Race] doesn't work).
Herobetty 5.4: Removed redundant black market mission variable getter, as it's already done earlier in this script.
Also checks if the new owner is not the player. If so, and the ship is a black market ship, mission fails.
The player has 4/3/2 +/- 0.5 hours on easy/normal/hard to claim the ship for their own. After that, the ship becomes open for anyone to grab.
ZH 2.0
Remnant and black market "missions".
Herobetty 5.4: an NPC faction claimed this ship, and it is a black market ship!
Herobetty 5.4: remove the ship from the black market ship array, if it's present.
This array is used in the monitor script to determine when to allow the ship to be capturable by tugs.
Mordan2 - we name our own captured ships elsewhere.
